Name: King Pins
About the game: About King Pins is a small scale real-time strategy game. Play short rounds of 20 to 60 minutes where you quickly build an army of one of the different civilizations: humans, goblins, elves and the undead! You can even play locally with up to 4 people with controllers! Collect resources and expand your territory while defending your main unit: the king! If your king dies, you lose! Features ~1 hour Campaign: a short story captured in challenging levels that you will teach you how to play the game 4 different civilizations, each play very differently! then play versus match with up to 4 players locally or, face off against computer controlled AI which you can set to 3 different difficulties. (or watch them fight each other instead!) random generated maps, with each civilization having a multitude of buildings, unit and upgrades, make for endless possibilities! Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
